ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] greetings and a ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok that is it, it has to be the PLAIN FORGE and nothing else. Good Luck ...    The Forge in Felwith is a
ygData.messageBody:
Ok that is it, it has to be the PLAIN FORGE and
nothing else.


Good Luck
--- Nuada bobkins <ikestarwolf@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html>

<div style='background-color:'><DIV>
<P>The Forge in Felwith is a "Cultural Forge" it can
only be used with the High Elf Reciepes, you have to
use the forge in kelethin to do normal smithing - i
dont know if theres a normal forge in felwith i have
never found one.</P>
<P>the crude bricks of bronze can most often be found
in Butcherblock on venders and i think they drop from
the goblins and orcs i think they also drop in CB but
much rarer than in Buthcerblock i think.</P>
<P>Nuada<BR><BR></P></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>>From: "(Ralph) Clay"
<WOLFFMANUS@...>
<DIV></DIV>>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
<DIV></DIV>>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
<DIV></DIV>>Subject: [EverQuest] greetings and a ?
<DIV></DIV>>Date: Wed, 06 Nov 2002 16:52:26 -0000
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>Well EQ got me hooked.
<DIV></DIV>> I started playing about 2 months ago
and am really enjoying
<DIV></DIV>>myself. But I am stuck. I use the diff.
infomation and maps you can
<DIV></DIV>>find on the net as well as equipment
list ect to help me find things
<DIV></DIV>>for quests ect. well I am stumped...
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>I am working on a High Elf Pally and am
really enjoying building this
<DIV></DIV>>guy up. I started working on the
Felwithe Defenders Falchion quest.
<DIV></DIV>>I am 8th level and the quest is rated
10th to 15th level.I started
<DIV></DIV>>the quest (talking to the Seria elf in
the pally house) I killed the
<DIV></DIV>>masked spy and the Gen. Orc (with the
help of a Dwarf with a Big
<DIV></DIV>>hammer.) (Note: the Spy and the Gen.
Orc can be found talking
<DIV></DIV>>together at -2096.28, 2326.77 in
Greater Faydark)and they can be
<DIV></DIV>>pulled with spells one at a time) I got
their heads and turned them
<DIV></DIV>>in to Seria and got the dull sword I'm
to sharpen the sword, and turn
<DIV></DIV>>it in with some arborean amber and a
P.forest drakeling scale to get
<DIV></DIV>>the first pally sword....well the dum
sword will not sharpen, I use 1
<DIV></DIV>>and 2 sharping stones, the sword and
put them in the forge in the
<DIV></DIV>>armorer's shop and I'm told "these
idems will not combine try another
<DIV></DIV>>forge...WHAT other forge?? My first ?
is..is there another forge in
<DIV></DIV>>the high elf city and if so where or is
it because I am only 8th
<DIV></DIV>>level?
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>my 2nd ? is on the first Pally armor
quest where or what in the name
<DIV></DIV>>of all the good gods can I find or what
is "Brick of crude Bronze"
<DIV></DIV>>and where can I find/make them (I need
2 for my first peace of armor)
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>Thanks
<DIV></DIV>>
<DIV></DIV>>Slicesi
<DIV></DIV>>High Elf Pally
<DIV></DIV>>No Guild
<DIV></DIV>>
